item.title: MyStErIoUs ErRoR!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[center][i]I’ve come across an annoying error. I’ve seen it during playing other servers.
I was trying to make the skill levels different colours.
I added the code.

{ sendQuest(" @whi@CoMbAt: @red@%1", 3983); // NoThInG.. sendQuest("", 3984); // NoThInG.. sendQuest("", 3985); // NoThInG.. sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[2]+"@whi@", 4006); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])+"@red@", 4007); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])+"", 4009); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[4]+"", 4010); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])+"", 4011); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[5]+"", 4012); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 4013); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[6]+"", 4014); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])+"", 4015); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[3]+"", 4016); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])+"", 4017); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[16]+"", 4018); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[16])+"", 4019); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[15]+"", 4020); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[15])+"", 4021); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[17]+"", 4022); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[17])+"", 4023); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[12]+"", 4024); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])+"", 4025); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[9]+"", 4026); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])+"", 4027); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[14]+"", 4028); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])+"", 4029); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[13]+"", 4030); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[13])+"", 4031); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[10]+"", 4032); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[10])+"", 4033); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[7]+"", 4034); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])+"", 4035); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[11]+"", 4036); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[11])+"", 4037); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[8]+"", 4038); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[8])+"", 4039); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[20]+"", 4152); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[20])+"", 4153); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[18]+"", 12166); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])+"", 12167); sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[19]+"", 13926); sendQuest("@red@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[19])+"", 13927); }

That should make them all.
White and red.
But i logged on and this happend.

Wierd huh.
Could anyone help.
I’ve tried most basic things.

Thankyou.

-Slivion[/center]

Read full topic
